mapper.sql: agent_name, agent_code, qq, agent_desc, mobile, agent_status, creator, recharge_point, cash_point, register_date, agent_account, agent_password, agent_id
mapper.insert: insert into agent_info ( agent_name, agent_code, qq, agent_desc, mobile, agent_status, creator, recharge_point, cash_point, register_date, agent_account, agent_password, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) values ( #{agentName}, #{agentCode}, #{qq}, #{agentDesc}, #{mobile}, #{agentStatus}, #{creator}, #{rechargePoint}, #{cashPoint}, #{registerDate}, #{agentAccount}, #{agentPassword}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: update agent_info set agent_name = #{agentName}, agent_code = #{agentCode}, qq = #{qq}, agent_desc = #{agentDesc}, mobile = #{mobile}, agent_status = #{agentStatus}, creator = #{creator}, recharge_point = #{rechargePoint}, cash_point = #{cashPoint}, register_date = #{registerDate}, agent_account = #{agentAccount}, agent_password = #{agentPassword}, gmt_modified = NOW() where agent_id = #{agentId}
mapper.select:
select
from agent_info WHERE agent_status != -1 limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
select count(1) from agent_info WHERE agent_status != -1
SELECT count(1) FROM agent_info WHERE agent_account = #{account}
SELECT count(1) FROM agent_info WHERE agent_id != #{agentID} AND agent_account = #{account}
